import React, { Component } from 'react' import Slide from "../assets/images/slide.png" import SlideM from "../assets/images/slide-mob.png" import Light from "../assets/images/light.png" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default class Header2 extends Component { render() { return (
Henry Adeniyi Ogunwuyi
  • Life Gallery Tributes Stories Funeral
) } }
